description: bust-length portrait of woman turned to the right in a two-tiered necklace and buttons running down the front of her garment; hair is drawn in long finger-like strokes
inscription: LLC in plate in reverse: Walter / 27 | LL of sheet, in pencil: II. Zustand. Probedruck | LL margin of sheet, in pencil: Dr. Rauert. E 239-A | LLC of sheet in pencil, on verso: 2258
signed: LR in pencil, below image: Walter Gramatté / 27
title: Russian Girl with Necklace (Sonia Gramatté)
